WP-Prnla is a WordPress plugin which allows the use of Prnla http://prn.la as a shortlink / URL shortener.

[http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-prnla/ Download]

==Installation==
  # Unzip wp-prnla-version.zip to wp-content/plugins/ .
  # Go to 'Manage Plugins' page and activate WP-Prnla plugin.

==Usage==
  * When you're adding a new post, or editing an existing post, there's a "Get Shortlink" button at the right side of the permalink. If you click that button, then a pop-up window will appear with the Prnla short URL.
